description:
ðŸŽ¨ A secure boot compatible in-memory UxTheme patcher that removes signature verification of styles in Windows.


Important
If you have a previous version installed, you will have to use ThemeTool from the previous release to uninstall it first. The installer will not let you install until that happens.
- Patching style files is no longer needed
- Removed ThemeTool. If you used its functionality, please see ThemeToolSharp
- Removed ThemeDll
- Removed ThemeLib
- Themes can be changed from immersive System Settings and Personalization
- ARM64X support
- Installers are now MSI
